dataIdInfo.idPurp: Intended to provide a suite of scripts to use DEMs for a variety of elevation derivatives. So far, there is only one script, Surface Metrics, which provides first- and second-order derivatives of elevation and a measure of local relief. This script calls compiled Fortran programs from the Netstream suite. These programs are licensed under GPLv3 and are available from Dan Miller (danmiller.esi@gmail.com).
